title: How to Add an RSS Feed to a Blogger Blog

steps.title: Scroll down to the Feed gadget.
steps.content: Scroll down to the Feed gadget.

steps.title: Click the blue + beside the gadget.
steps.content: Click the blue + beside the gadget.

steps.title: Paste in the URL of the feed you want to include.
steps.content: Paste in the URL of the feed you want to include.

steps.title: Chose the options you want displayed- number of posts,item dates, item sources, and whether to open links in a new window.
steps.content: Chose the options you want displayed- number of posts,item dates, item sources, and whether to open links in a new window.

steps.title: Drag your gadget to where you would like it.
steps.content: Drag your gadget to where you would like it.

steps.title: Click 'Preview'- a new tab will open for previewing
steps.content: Click 'Preview'- a new tab will open for previewing

steps.title: Like it?
steps.content: Like it? Click Save. This will result in a feed of the last entry titles being displayed on your page as a widget.
